definition: from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor

sentences.english: She was 16 years old to enter the Chinese People's Liberation Army Art Academy, where he studied Li Shuangjiang.
sentences.chinese: 她16歲進入中國解放軍藝術學院學習，師從李雙江。

sentences.english: And have a chance for ourselves from beam wall be improved a lot later kungfu.
sentences.chinese: 並有機會師從梁壁令自己的詠春功夫得到很大提升。

sentences.english: The vicar left his position near the soldier, and disappeared into a back room.
sentences.chinese: 牧師從位於士兵身旁的他的位置上離開，走進了後房。

sentences.english: Look. This is a cap. cap, cap, cap.
sentences.chinese: 教師從桌下快速出示一頂紅帽子。

sentences.english: Two network engineers were transferred from the IT department to the New York office.
sentences.chinese: 兩位網絡工程師從IT部外調到了紐約辦事處。

sentences.english: Studied orchestration from a teacher , Mengweidong.
sentences.chinese: 師從孟衛東老師學習配器。

sentences.english: She apprenticed with the great master.
sentences.chinese: 她師從這位著名的大師當學徒。

sentences.english: He went to Paris to study with a famous French doctor, Charcot.
sentences.chinese: 後來他去了巴黎，師從法國名醫夏科特。

sentences.english: The magician conjured a bowl of fish out of his hat.
sentences.chinese: 魔術師從帽子裏變出一碗魚來。

sentences.english: The lawyer steps out and the sheriff takes out his nightstick and starts beating the lawyer with it.
sentences.chinese: 律師從車裏出來，警長拿出他的警棍開始打律師。

sentences.english: In the twinkling of an eye, the conjuror pulled a bird out of a cup.
sentences.chinese: 一霎那間魔術師從杯中取出一隻鳥。

sentences.english: A good security analyst starts by looking deeper into the situation.
sentences.chinese: 一名優秀的安全分析師從深入研究問題着手。

sentences.english: He graduated from Hangzhou National Art College in 1946, under the instruction of Lin Fengmian.
sentences.chinese: 1946年畢業於國立杭州藝專，師從林風眠先生。

sentences.english: She is studying from professor Weimin Hu at the attached middle school of Sichuan conservatory of music.
sentences.chinese: 現就讀中國四川音樂學院附中，師從胡惟民老師。

sentences.english: The tutor copied one from the book and gave it to the rich man.
sentences.chinese: 這個塾師從書本上抄了一篇，就把祭文給了富人。

sentences.english: She studies under Merlin, but is plotting all the time to overthrow Arthur and his court at Camelot.
sentences.chinese: 師從梅林，卻一直想要推翻亞瑟王的卡米洛特政權。
